com.camerontec.catalys.util.collection

Interface IClassInstanceRegistry

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IClassInstanceFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractClassInstanceFactory, ClassInstanceRegistry, RepositoryComponentsFactory, RepositoryEnumsFactory, RepositoryFieldsFactory, RepositoryMsgContentsFactory, RepositoryMsgTypeFactory

    public interface IClassInstanceRegistry
    Registry (collection) of objects indexed by class and a String identifier.

    This is useful for reusing existing object instances.

    Registries can be single class registries where all contained objects must be instances of the same class - or they can contain any number of classes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CATEGORY
      This attribute holds the object category - can be used to group similar objects together.
      static String ID
      This attribute holds the object instance identification.
      static String REFID
      This attribute holds a reference to an existing object instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears all registered objects.
      Object find(Class<?> cl, String id)
      Returns the object instance with the given class and id.
      Object find(String id)
      Returns the object instance with the given id.
      Class<?> getRegistryClass()
      For single class registries, returns the class that all objects must be an instance of.
      Object register(String id, Object obj)
      Registers an object with the registry with the given id.

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears all registered objects.

      • find

        Object find(String id)
        Returns the object instance with the given id.

        Only used for single class registries - ie registries where getRegistryClass returns non null.

        Parameters:
        id - Identifier of instance of object to find.
        Returns:
        Found object or null if no such object.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if this is not a single class registry.

      • find

        Object find(Class<?> cl,
            String id)
        Returns the object instance with the given class and id.
        Parameters:
        cl - Class of object to find.
        id - Identifier of instance of object to find.
        Returns:
        Found object or null if no such object.

      • getRegistryClass

        Class<?> getRegistryClass()
        For single class registries, returns the class that all objects must be an instance of.

        Returns null for registries that are not restricted to a single class.

        Returns:
        Class that all objects must be instance of or null if registry can hold objects of any class.

      • register

        Object register(String id,
                Object obj)
         throws Exception
        Registers an object with the registry with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - id of registered object.
        obj - Object to be registered.
        Returns:
        Previous object registered with this id - null if none.
        Throws:
        Exception - If the object's class is not allowed in this registry.
